boardgame.name: The Burning Blue
boardgame.description: (from GMT games website:)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Beginning with the fighting above the Channel convoys and ending with the assault on London and the fighter-bomber offensive, The Burning Blue simulates battles between German air power and the British air defence system. It recreates the tense minute-by-minute 'plotting board' battles between RAF fighter controllers and the Luftwaffe air raids.[...]_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Based on original archive research and with the help of pilot veterans of the Battle of Britain, The Burning Blue models this famous conflict in unprecedented detail. Playable and exciting, the game provides new insights into this turning point of World War Two._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;COMPONENTS :_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 684 full-color die-cut counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;x34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; full-color mapsheet [730 Kb]_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 40-page Rule Book_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 48-page Scenario Book_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 11x17 Hostile Raid Displays_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 11x17 Royal Air Force Squadron Tote Board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 Player Aid Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Logsheet Booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 6-sided dice_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DESIGNER Lee Brimmicombe-Wood_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;ART DIRECTOR/PACKAGE DESIGN Rodger B. MacGowan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MAP ART Lee Brimmicombe-Wood_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;COUNTER ART Lee Brimmicombe-Wood_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Burning Blue uses a system similar to the one used in Downtown: Air War Over Hanoi, 1965-1972_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

An additional copy of rules and scenario book v1.0, laser-printed and spiral-bound, is included. Includes original dice. Shipping weight is over 3lb, so shipping in the US will be via USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate, $10.50. International shipping in North America will be $15-$20. Condition: Brand new! Cards in shrink, counters unpunched, the little d6 is present and accounted for, you get the picture. And speaking of pictures, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve uploaded snaps of the box and all game components. Please note: there is a little whitening/scuffing on the box lid/corners. (As I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m slightly fastidious, when taking pics I also noted a minor bump/wrinke at the top of a play aid and a map. I took a zoomed/detailed shot of each.). Shipping: the price I pay to Canada Post, FedEx, or UPS (your choice of company and method) is the price you pay. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t charge extra for handling or packing materials. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ship anywhere in the world (yes, that includes Brazil)... but all buyers should be aware that I assume no liability for parcels when they leave my hands. Insurance recommended, particularly for international buyers. Payment: As an L5R addict, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m always looking to grab more booster boxes from CoolStuffInc, or Amazon, or Ebay. I would thus prefer payment via a Gift Certificate to any of those fine establishments. If the buyer would prefer, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll also accept Paypal, provided the buyer covers any fee that may apply. Miscellaneous: BGG will receive its 3%, of course. Item will ship within 3 days of payment clearing. Any questions, please feel free to PM!
Unpunched. Weight : 1.2 kg Please ask for shipping rate to your country.
